scripts.deps: npm run deps:frontend && npm run deps:backend
scripts.deps:frontend: npm -C projects/QuickStartTemplate-frontend ci || npm -C projects/QuickStartTemplate-frontend install
scripts.deps:backend: npm -C projects/QuickStartTemplate-contracts ci || npm -C projects/QuickStartTemplate-contracts install
scripts.dev: npx -y concurrently -k -n FRONTEND,SERVER -c auto "cd projects/QuickStartTemplate-frontend && npm run dev" "cd projects/QuickStartTemplate-contracts/nft_mint_server && node server.js"
scripts.dev:boot: npm run bootstrap && npm run dev
